contentList.content: Built to fight, Warforged are made from wood and metal, but they can feel pain and emotion. Warforged can be a steadfast ally or a cold-hearted killing machine.
Envoy Warforged are built with a certain specialized function in mind. They are the rarest of warforged, and are often very unique.
Juggernaut Warforged are imposing war machines built for combat and raw power.
Skirmisher Warforged are built to quickly and quietly scout a battle and outmaneuver their oponents. They are nimble and designed for speed.
You gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being poisoned, and are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to poison damage.
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to disease, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Increase an Ability Score by 1. Gain two <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skill</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiencies</LSTag> of your choice.
Gain a cantrip, and Cast Detect Thoughts once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Gain +1 <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>. Increases <LSTag Tooltip="CarryWeight">Carrying capacity</LSTag> by 40%.
When you make an unarmed strike, deal an additional [1] bludgeoning damage.
Gain +1 <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> checks.
As an Envoy Warforged, you may choose an Ability Score to increase by +1. This increase applies after the Ability point buy.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Daggers, Rapiers, and Hand Crosbows.
As an Envoy Warforged, you may choose a specialized cantrip to shape your adaptive form. This cantrip doesn't use <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> and can be cast at will.
